T04sanss19u:4: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
T04sanss19u:7: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
T04sanss19u:8: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss19u:13: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss19u:19: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss19u:21: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss19u:23: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss19u:27: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss19u:29: sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss19u:33: sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām anekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ /
T04sanss19u:36: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss19u:42: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam /
T04sanss19u:44: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
T04sanss19u:46: sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhyâiva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
T04sanss19u:49: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbo-
T04sanss19u:51: dhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
T04sanss19u:52: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
T04sanss19u:54: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvôtsṛṣṭakāyenâpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkārôpakaraṇena ca /
T04sanss19u:56: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkārôpakaraṇāni haranti tebhyâivâitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
T04sanss19u:57: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodhôtpādayitavyaḥ /
T04sanss19u:58: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasâparāddhavyaṃ /
T04sanss19u:59: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
T04sanss19u:60: anuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
T04sanss19u:61: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /
T04sanss19u:62: ete cânye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
T04sanss19u:67: tvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
T04sanss19u:74: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi /
T04sanss19u:75: aho vatâlpapuṇyâmī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
T04sanss19u:76: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
T04sanss19u:77: satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante /
T04sanss19u:78: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathâṣṭâṅgôpetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti /
T04sanss19u:79: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti //
T04sanss19u:80: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
T04sanss19u:82: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ bu-
T04sanss19u:84: ddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
T04sanss19u:85: satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi
T04sanss19u:88: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo yâivâbhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evâkāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati
T04sanss19u:89: tad yathâpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate /
T04sanss19u:90: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikâbhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
T04sanss19u:91: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadêti //
T04sanss19u:103: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati /
T04sanss19u:120: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ /
T04sanss19u:121: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyâpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04sanss19u:122: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyâikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇârādhitaḥ syāṃ /
T04sanss19u:123: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cârhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
T04sanss19u:126: tat kiṃ manyase ānandâpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
T04sanss19u:130: ataḥ sânanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
T04sanss19u:131: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
T04sanss19u:141: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati
T04sanss19u:143: evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandânavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetânuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T04sanss19u:149: nu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
T04sanss19u:150: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśetâlīnacittaḥ //
T04sanss19u:151: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate /
T04sanss19u:153: caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ /
T04sanss19u:154: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā //
T04sanss19u:157: sudhautapādaś côpāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena câpi //
T04sanss19u:158: dharmâsane tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekâgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan /
T04sanss19u:159: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś cô bhikṣunikās tathâiva //
T04sanss19u:160: kilāsitāś câpi vivarjayīta na câpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ /
T04sanss19u:161: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca //
T04sanss19u:162: bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭântakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ /
T04sanss19u:163: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathâiva toṣayet na câpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet //
T04sanss19u:164: khŌüdyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathânnapŌünaṃ vastrŌüṇi śayyâsanacīvarŌüṇi /
T04sanss19u:165: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñape-
T04sanss19u:169: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā /
T04sanss19u:170: etac ca me sarvasukhôpadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke //atrâivâha //
T04sanss19u:171: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇâpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti //
T04sanss19u:173: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt /
T04sanss19u:175: evaṃ tvaṃ*vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ /
T04sanss19u:176: kathaṃ mahâtmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā //
T04sanss19u:177: sahasâiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ /
T04sanss19u:179: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān /
T04sanss19u:180: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ //
T04sanss19u:181: bhaveyur yadi câlpêcchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
T04sanss19u:182: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām //
T04sanss19u:185: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ /
T04sanss19u:212: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārâbhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā /
T04sanss19u:213: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ
T04sanss19u:214: tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyêmāni mantrapadāny
T04sanss19u:216: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatôpasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe /
T04sanss19u:217: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty antarāyaṃ kartum iti //atrâivâha /
T04sanss19u:218: dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti //
T04sanss19u:223: tad yathâpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante /
T04sanss19u:224: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhārôpacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ /
T04sanss19u:233: tatrânutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyâiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātîty anena rakṣā //
T04sanss19u:234: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatîty anena śuddhiḥ /
T04sanss19u:235: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati /
T04sanss19u:236: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatîty ādi /
T04sanss19u:238: etāni ca nityam apramādâdhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt //
T04sanss19u:240: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathâiva kṣāntiḥ /
T04sanss19u:241: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita /
T04sanss19u:245: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchila-
T04sanss19u:252: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
T04sanss19u:254: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
T04sanss19u:256: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ câdīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T04sanss19u:258: punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyârakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ
T04sanss19u:259: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca tasyânulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ /
T04sanss19u:260: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati /
T04sanss19u:261: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T04sanss19u:262: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati /
T04sanss19u:263: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T04sanss19u:264: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakâdhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astîti prajānāti /
T04sanss19u:266: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi //
T04sanss19u:271: yad yoniśaś câiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti //āha ca /
T04sanss19u:275: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyâstv apāratā /
T04sanss19u:276: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet //
T04sanss19u:277: tadduṣkhena na me bādhêty ato yadi na rakṣasi /
T04sanss19u:278: nâgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi //
T04sanss19u:280: anyâiva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate //
T04sanss19u:281: anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ /
T04sanss19u:283: mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate /
T04sanss19u:290: kāyaś cet pratimâkāraḥ pesībhasmasu nâsti saḥ //
T04sanss19u:291: sūkṣmabhāvena cet tatra sthaulyaṃ tyaktvā vyavasthitaḥ /
T04sanss19u:294: tatra cintâiva me nâsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān /
T04sanss19u:295: avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā câiva dṛśyate //
T04sanss19u:300: na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇâpi /
T04sanss19u:301: pratyekaṃ tryātmakās te 'pi śeṣaṃ nâikavidhaṃ jagat //
T04sanss19u:303: sukhâder na paṭṭôtpattiḥ paṭṭâdes tu sukhâdayaḥ /
T04sanss19u:307: svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā /
T04sanss19u:309: dīpatailaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti kṣīyamānaṃ na lakṣyate /
T04sanss19u:310: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ //
T04sanss19u:312: tatrâbhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate //
T04sanss19u:315: aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parâtmanoḥ //
T04sanss19u:316: ayuktam api ced etat svâtmany astîtaratra na /
T04sanss19u:317: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ //
T04sanss19u:318: kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt /
T04sanss19u:323: tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇâpy arasena kim //
T04sanss19u:324: evaṃ parârthaṃ kṛtvâpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
T04sanss19u:343: tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati /
T04sanss19u:345: loke duṣkhâgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet /
T04sanss19u:347: ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ /
T04sanss19u:348: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svârtham utsṛjan //
T04sanss19u:352: yad bhayān nôtsṛjāmy etat tad evâdadato bhayaṃ /
T04sanss19u:353: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ //yadi ni-
T04sanss19u:356: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayâiva sā //
T04sanss19u:360: yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vôpayojayet //
T04sanss19u:361: svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ nêha duṣkhakṛt /
T04sanss19u:367: kopaḥ kasyârtham adyâpi mṛṣā vā tan mayôditam //
T04sanss19u:368: svârthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati /
T04sanss19u:369: nirdayasyâpi kaḥ kopaḥ parârtho yadi naśyati //
T04sanss19u:374: nâpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogârthaṃ nôpayāti ca //
T04sanss19u:381: yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ //
T04sanss19u:383: evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān //
T04sanss19u:389: kâiva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī /
T04sanss19u:394: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ parâtmā ca sarvadā //
T04sanss19u:396: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvâdbhutaṃ mahat //
T04sanss19u:400: vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ //
T04sanss19u:405: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā /
T04sanss19u:406: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt //
T04sanss19u:416: mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ /
T04sanss19u:427: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathâtyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyôpārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me /
T04sanss19u:428: bhavatu sukham anantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam ana-
